name: habitsync
description: HabitSync is a self-hosted habit tracker that syncs daily routines and progress between devices. It supports streaks, charts, and reminders designed with a focus on privacy and data control.
features: Sync: Cross-device synchronization, Real-time updates, Cloud backup. Access everywhere.
Streaks: Track consistency, Visualize progress, Motivation boost. Keep going.
Reminders: Custom notifications, Time-based alerts, Never forget. Stay on track.
Charts: Progress visualization, Trend analysis, Success metrics. See your growth.
Privacy: Self-hosted option, Encrypted data, No tracking. Your data, your control.
Habits: Unlimited habits, Custom frequencies, Flexible scheduling. Track anything.
Goals: Set targets, Milestone tracking, Achievement system. Reach your potential.
Mobile: Android app, Offline support, Background sync. Always available.
